content: You'll need to defeat the Macaque Chief inside his magic sack to escape, whereupon you'll be transported to his floating shelf, and you'll be able to fight him one last time.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Yellowbrow.md', within the main section titled 'Yellowbrow', specifically from the subsection 'Yellowbrow Boss Fight and Guide'.
The content is as follows:
You'll need to defeat the Macaque Chief inside his magic sack to escape, whereupon you'll be transported to his floating shelf, and you'll be able to fight him one last time.
